sub_fields.label: Full Row Block
sub_fields.name: full_row_block
sub_fields.instructions: This block style gives you the flexibility of a full-width text column. Or add an image to break up the space. Select Blockquote if you want to make a statement or quote. Attribute the quote to give credit.

sub_fields.label: Value Proposition Repeater
sub_fields.name: stack_layouts
sub_fields.instructions: Build a stack of value propositions with this repeater tool.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Don't use the crop if your source image is less than 150x150px. If you have a larger image, this will help create a smaller image to fit the design.

sub_fields.label: Text Block
sub_fields.name: text_block
sub_fields.instructions: This gives you carte-blanche control over this row. Let's explore this to see what you need.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add an optional section title; of course try it without if you'd rather.

sub_fields.label: Set Gap
sub_fields.name: set_gap
sub_fields.instructions: Standard Block spacing can be modified with this custom selector. The default size is 6 rem, but you can choose from six to zero. Read about the rem unit, https://engageinteractive.co.uk/blog/em-vs-rem-vs-px.

sub_fields.label: Break Block
sub_fields.name: break_block
sub_fields.instructions: This blockquote will be centered with heavy padding surrounding the words. Quote marks are included in the start and end corners. Select a background option to add a bit of interest.

sub_fields.label: Set Gap
sub_fields.name: set_gap
sub_fields.instructions: Standard Block spacing can be modified with this custom selector. The default size is 6 rem, but you can choose from six to zero. Read about the rem unit, https://engageinteractive.co.uk/blog/em-vs-rem-vs-px.

sub_fields.label: Credited to
sub_fields.name: credited_to
sub_fields.instructions: Give a name to give credit to the quote above. This is not necessary, but it is here if you need it.

sub_fields.label: Background Pattern
sub_fields.name: background_pattern
sub_fields.instructions: Select from the provided background art options to display in the background of your quotations box. I've taken the liberty to add a few I like. I can add others if you prefer.

594e7f7a56cdc.name: layout_cta_left_optin
594e7f7a56cdc.label: 2-Col CTA with Check Mark Repeater on Left

sub_fields.label: Add Background Image
sub_fields.name: left_optin_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Image will appear on right of the row at desktop view. The image crop is vital in delivering a smaller-sized image to devices for display. While not required, please use an image of 900 x 600 or larger for this part. How much of the image that displays depends on the amount of text used. Please do not attempt to start with images that are too big as WP will complain. An image that is less than 5000px wide is a good place to start. Use web formats such as JPG, PNG or SVG.

sub_fields.label: Choose Content Layout
sub_fields.name: left_optin_toggle_sub_content
sub_fields.instructions: For this layout you have two styles. One is an open paragraph styles and the other enables a three bullet configuration. Each check mark heading may include a link pointing to an internal page.

sub_fields.label: Add Paragraph Text
sub_fields.name: left_optin_paragraph_text
sub_fields.instructions: This gives you a little flexibility, but it is intended to limit how content is formatted. It is a little more than a text box yet not a full Wysiwyg field either. Restrictions help us stay within the bounds of our design.

sub_fields.label: Three Row Punchlist Repeater
sub_fields.name: left_optin_punchlist_repeater
sub_fields.instructions: Add heading and brief, single paragraph description. Limit three.

sub_fields.label: Sub-Heading
sub_fields.name: left_optin_sub-heading
sub_fields.instructions: Give a brief heading.

sub_fields.label: Sub-Heading Link
sub_fields.name: sub_heading_link
sub_fields.instructions: This is an optional page link to add to the heading.

sub_fields.label: Paragraph
sub_fields.name: left_optin_sub_paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: Add a brief description for the feature. Limit one paragraph.

sub_fields.label: Add a CTA Button?
sub_fields.name: left_optin_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: The default settings show the button. Deselect to hide.

sub_fields.label: Opt-In Button
sub_fields.name: optin_button
sub_fields.instructions: Compose a link that engages and asks the user to do something. Split test to determine what wording works best on this call to action (CTA).

sub_fields.label: Link Target
sub_fields.name: optin_link_target
sub_fields.instructions: The target determines what type of tab we are opening. Do we go to a new page or open this page in a new tab?

sub_fields.label: Button Style
sub_fields.name: optin_button_style
sub_fields.instructions: The designer used blue for 'Learn More' style buttons where the brand red color targeted sales.

sub_fields.label: Link Type
sub_fields.name: optin_link_type
sub_fields.instructions: Will this link point to an internal page or would you like to set a custom page or unique page such as for a Lead page. Use a custom link type for such a page.

sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: optin_custom_link
sub_fields.instructions: Only a full URL will work here.

sub_fields.label: Add Section Title
sub_fields.name: right_optin_section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title of the section row.

sub_fields.label: Add Background Image
sub_fields.name: right_optin_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: A background image will appear to left of text. The image crop is vital in delivering a smaller-sized image to devices for display. While not required, please use an image of 900 x 600 or larger for this part. How much of the image that displays depends on the amount of text used. Please do not attempt to start with images that are too big as WP will complain. An image that is less than 5000px wide is a good place to start. Use web formats such as JPG, PNG or SVG.

sub_fields.label: Add Content
sub_fields.name: right_optin_copy
sub_fields.instructions: This gives you a little flexibility, but it is intended to limit how content is formatted. It is a little more than a text box yet not a full Wysiwyg field either. Restrictions help us stay within the bounds of our design.  Is there an optional layout you would like to try here? Please let me know.

sub_fields.label: Add a CTA Button?
sub_fields.name: right_optin_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: The default settings show the button. Deselect to hide.

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: optin_button
sub_fields.instructions: Compose a link that engages and asks the user to do something. Split test to determine what wording works best on this call to action (CTA).

sub_fields.label: Button Style
sub_fields.name: optin_button_style
sub_fields.instructions: The designer used blue for 'Learn More,' where the red targeted sales. There are no hard and fast rules.

sub_fields.label: Link Target
sub_fields.name: optin_link_target
sub_fields.instructions: The target determines what type of tab we are opening. Do we go to a new page or open this page in a new tab?

sub_fields.label: Link Type
sub_fields.name: optin_link_type
sub_fields.instructions: Will this link point to an internal page or would you like to set a custom page or unique page such as for a Lead page. Use a custom link type for such a page.

sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: optin_custom_link
sub_fields.instructions: Only a full URL will work here.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Give a title for this section. This is optional if the row does not need one.

sub_fields.label: Remove gutters?
sub_fields.name: remove_gutters
sub_fields.message: Gutters between columns will be removed if checked.

sub_fields.label: Set gap
sub_fields.name: set_gap
sub_fields.instructions: Standard Block spacing can be modified with this custom selector. The default size is 6 rem, but you can choose from six to zero.

sub_fields.label: Assemble Card
sub_fields.name: assemble_card
sub_fields.instructions: You'll need at least two cards to make it awesome. Three to four is nice.

sub_fields.label: Card Title
sub_fields.name: card_title
sub_fields.instructions: Not too much fanfare; a title is the first pitch.

sub_fields.label: Card Title Location
sub_fields.name: over_image
sub_fields.message: Uncheck if card title should appear below image.

sub_fields.label: Select a text color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: Broad control over text color based on image background. The default is white.

sub_fields.label: Card Text
sub_fields.name: card_text
sub_fields.instructions: Similar to an excerpt, we are looking for a teasing line to grab one's attention.

sub_fields.label: Card Image
sub_fields.name: card_image
sub_fields.instructions: Like other images in this site, they are boxy. Looking for curves? Let's explore it.

sub_fields.label: Add a deluxe button?
sub_fields.name: button_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: This is one of the best buttons I've ever built. You have a high amount of flexibility and control for where the link points and how it looks.
sub_fields.message: Check here to enable your deluxe button.

sub_fields.label: Button Name
sub_fields.name: button_name
sub_fields.instructions: Wording is very important. Uses love slightly directive buttons.

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions: We're offering two brand colors. What other colors are you looking for? Let's explore this.

sub_fields.label: Target
sub_fields.name: target
sub_fields.instructions: Will the link open a new tab or render a new page.

sub_fields.label: Type
sub_fields.name: type
sub_fields.instructions: Internal gives options for the types of pages to open on the site. Custom offers the opportunity to link off-site to perhaps a Lead page or other resource.

sub_fields.label: Internal Link
sub_fields.name: internal_link
sub_fields.instructions: Choose from the selection provided for the page you'd like.

sub_fields.label: Custom Link
sub_fields.name: custom_link
sub_fields.instructions: Only a full URL will work here.

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a title for this section. If you add no title, there will be no title.

sub_fields.label: Set gap
sub_fields.name: set_gap
sub_fields.instructions: Standard Block spacing can be modified with this custom selector. The default size is 6 rem, but you can choose from six to zero.

sub_fields.label: Number of posts
sub_fields.name: number_of_posts
sub_fields.instructions: This number will dictate the number of posts displaying in this row. The CSS will adjust to equal columns. The code is designed to order these as 'latest posts' in descending order.

sub_fields.label: Post Type
sub_fields.name: post_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose from the types of posts to display in a row.

sub_fields.label: Display the featured image?
sub_fields.name: display_featured_image
sub_fields.instructions: Decide whether to show the post featured image (thumbnail) or go without for a spartan text look.
sub_fields.message: Selected, posts will include a heading image.

sub_fields.label: Show the excerpt?
sub_fields.name: show_excerpt
sub_fields.instructions: This builder includes a method to show or hide the excerpt added for your convenience.
sub_fields.message: Selected, the post will include an excerpt description, if included with the post.

sub_fields.label: Set excerpt length?
sub_fields.name: set_excerpt_length
sub_fields.instructions: This enables you to reign in excerpt length so the article shape can be consistent across posts. This enables a visual consistency but you can adjust by number of words set by a variable. This is applied to all posts in a section as specified.
sub_fields.message: Check to set a limit on the number of words in an excerpt.

sub_fields.label: Number of words
sub_fields.name: excerpt_limit
sub_fields.instructions: Provide a whole number value. This value is applied to all instances.

sub_fields.label: Display meta content?
sub_fields.name: display_meta_content
sub_fields.instructions: Meta content can be useful or it can be overkill. Select which combination meets your needs.
sub_fields.message: Check here if you wish to include any meta content on this post.

sub_fields.label: Which meta to include?
sub_fields.name: which_meta
sub_fields.instructions: Select which combo suits your needs according to the current layout. Please inform the designer if you wish a different configuration.
